name: workfront-event-source
description: Event ingestion via Workfront Event Subscription API

scripts.root:install: npm run env && npm run ins -- "Installing Top-Level Project Dependencies"                       .
scripts.root:install:all: npm run root:install && npm run eventHandler:install && npm run storeEvent:install
scripts.root:deploy:all: npm run stream:deploy && npm run eventHandler:deploy && npm run storeEvent:deploy
scripts.root:remove:all: npm run storeEvent:remove && npm run eventHandler:remove && npm run stream:remove
scripts.stream:deploy: npm run env && npm run sls -- deploy "Deploying Workfront Event Stream"                        ./stream
scripts.stream:remove: npm run env && npm run sls -- remove "Removing Workfront Event Stream"                         ./stream
scripts.eventHandler:install: npm run env && npm run ins -- "Installing Event Handler Dependencies"                   ./eventHandler
scripts.eventHandler:deploy: npm run env && npm run sls -- deploy "Deploying Event Handler"                           ./eventHandler
scripts.eventHandler:remove: npm run env && npm run sls -- remove "Removing Event Handler"                            ./eventHandler
scripts.storeEvent:install: npm run env && npm run ins -- "Installing Store Event Dependencies"                       ./storeEvent
scripts.storeEvent:deploy: npm run env && npm run sls -- deploy "Deploying Store Event"                               ./storeEvent
scripts.storeEvent:remove: npm run env && npm run sls -- remove "Removing Store Event"                                ./storeEvent

author: Nordstrom, Inc.
